ratings.comment: Kyle is a great professor, one of the most passionate professors I have ever had. You can really tell he cares about his students and he always keeps things interesting in class.

Kyle's passion for teaching definitely shows in his lectures. He's very clear on what material we would be tested on and helped to prepare students to succeed in the class. Kyle is also able to connect well with the class through his humor and honestly. He's definitely one of the best professors I've had at UW-Madison.

Kyle is a really laid-back, fun professor who always ends class with good music. It's clear that he cares about the material & he keeps the class engaging. The class is only graded on a couple things (2 papers, discussions, and a final) but it shouldn't be too hard to get a good grade, plus he gives all the terms you'll need to know for the test.
